page.title: 03HOW I GET TO SCHOOL
page.content: HEWORTH I get to school by bus, but first I have to get up at half past seven, get washed, get dressed and have breakfast and then watch television until twenty past eight then I leave the house and get the bus to school. A bus is about 20 feet high and has two levels and has four wheels and travels along a road to Heworth Metro. I get a bus from Heworth Metro to Heworth Grange School. Heworth Metro is a station where the Metro stops. The Metro is a train which runs on lines and has electric cables up above. Heworth Metro is an interchange which means you can get a Metro or British Rail train or a bus to where ever you want in the North East from Heworth.
